title: Multimedia Strauss: three tone poems (PC)
brief_description: Welcome to Multimedia Strauss. You will discover the beauty of three of Richard Strauss’ most popular - and powerful - tone poems. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: To hear the music and narration and to display the graphics and text you need: a multimedia PC that includes a 386SX or higher processor, 4MB of RAM, 5MB free hard disk space, CD-ROM drive, audio board capable of playing ADPCM compressed audio, mouse, and VGA or VGA+ display capable of displaying 256 colors or an equivalent PC with Multimedia upgrade kit. MS-DOS operating system version 3.1 or later. Microsoft Windows operating system 3.1. MS-DOS CD-ROM Extensions (MSCDEX) version 2.2 or later. Multimedia Strauss can also be played as an audio compact disc.
